header.rec_loc: The home of ANON, ANON, ANON, ANON and ANON, High Lane, Stockport.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food, napkins that look like underpants, Christmas shopping, turkey, how the family spend Christmas, Christmas music, nicknames with ANON's university friends, ANON in Florida, travelling to America, airport, how we treat each other, the weather, Downton Abbey, the wishbone, dance moves, cooking, how my friends spent Christmas Eve, our family friends, music in films, musical instruments, the Queenâ€™s speech, events this year.
header.conv_type: Discussing, Explaining, Inquiring, Complaining, Anecdote telling

body.u: it's a bit late now isn't it?
your mum's not had any yet
do you want some more of this?
it's alright I'll get some more
are you sure? there's some in the pan
oh no I'll go and do it now
oh I've got my underpants upside down
what've got on upside down? your underpants?
I saw them in M and S and I thought ah they'd be so funny
bet you didn't think your mother'd've bought them then
did you? no you'll be surprised what your mummy can do when she tries
is this what was in the bag that dad was nosing in?
yeah I dropped em on the floor
that's not ro not that bad have you got that?
get down there's a good girl
did you see on the news the other night?
yeah they came in for the turkeys
they were it was in the car park
but which one? Tesco or marks'?
mm they reckon marks' they reckon they haven't had a a as many erm temporary staff on
said they've run out of well she calls it turnip swede in
that has run out that people were panicking people went in every single shop and no shop had this had swede
and we dressed it didn't you?
and then we had a biology lesson didn't we ?
you didn't have to queue for anything there did you?
no it was fine weren't it? cleaner at work said to me the other day have you got your turkey? I said yeah so they went for it when did I go for it?
like Wednesday weren't it? oh no I said I'm going for it tonight that was right

I said oh I said the kids have got the car he said I wondered where your car was he said cos I thought you were in and erm I never thought to ask afterwards and erm I said got the car today I said and then we're going to to pick the turkey up mine's in the freezer bought from Iceland about six months ago
we always get it from there he said well I'm sure it be fine
don't think I would do it personally
mm yeah well he said to me do you always get a fresh one? I said yeah I said we have had frozen ones in the past I said but ever since I've been cooking it
we used to sell hundreds when I worked at frozen turkeys
mm well on Tuesday when I went into Aldi should've seen the turkeys the fresh ones there it had the best write up
and it was the rosemary potatoes
can't imagine frozen roast potatoes being very nice
you'd have to simmer em or something
mm if you've got a lot of people suppose it's a lot of work innit?
do they always all go to auntie 's?
sometimes they go to 's don't they?
she never puts anything in the oven when she's out there
when got there like mama come into our house and nothing was on nothing was in the oven
well they can have the turkey I don't know though
think they like this song cos they keep playing it
I've not heard it much I heard it quite a lot last year
I didn't hear it until this week
and then I seem to have heard it a lot what's she got?
was going the she was out last night next door
and then she was going to the same place for breakfast this morning
what's that papockets bloody film there?
that's what they all call like th we all call each other it's not offensive like this morning's put on Whatsapp merry Christmas
I was gonna say have you heard from them all?
and I snapchatted you last night something like merry Christmas
it was all lambs last year
no we're snakes this year we turned from lambs into snakes last year the transition ended
the only thing faulting I've got it right
we've got a group chat so yeah we've all put merry Christmas on there and I've just messaged cos it'll only be like what time is it like t half two?
so two one twelve eleven ten be quarter to ten there
well is it Christmas Day or is it Boxing Day there? are they not ahead?
Christmas no they're five hours behind
yeah they've gone to some erm family that they've got out there family friends girl called
mm family have gone out to see her
they're coming home on the twenty-seventh or eighth I think she said
see if I went to America you wouldn't come and see me would you?
I'd have to wouldn't I? I'd be scared but I'd have to
you wouldn't for Christmas would you?
wouldn't be able to afford to possibly
well you wouldn't do the plane flight would you?
don't mind it but I w don't want to be on a plane that long I don't think
no it's difficult because I don't like using the toilets
you say that but you've been in a car to for like six hours before
yes I know but that's different
well can I pu I can say stop I want to get off can't I?
yeah but you're being s waited on hand and foot on an aeroplane
oh I can't I don't think didn't think you were frightened
mm mm I'm not I don't mind but it's such a long time since I've been on a plane really and just think
it's all the hassle that goes with it it's getting through customs
it's not that difficult really nowadays I don't think
yeah I think it's really quick
going to the put me off that was enough for me
we flew through er security there didn't we?
well we did u when when we went to Lanzarote
yeah we did I mean years ago when me and used to go to tenerife we had loads and loads of time to look round duty-free you don't now
you've hardly any time have you?

u.unclear: don't understand why it does that though

body.u: Monsoon we were looking for her
they didn't say your names did they?
oh sorry I thought we'd got some open
I didn't mean you could stop eating
oh I f kinda hard at Christmas why do you all get so pansy round each other?
mm what's the wor what's the word like?
not pansy like you you know what I mean?
pussyfooting round each other oh I'm sorry oh well if you don't well it'd be okay oh then don't worry about it I'll do it myself lat don't worry about it
instead of saying what the bloody hell do you want next?
well no I didn't mean him to
stop eating his tea dinner I could've stopped eating my own
woo what you need to be worried about is me turning into me mother cos she don't take no messing off no one
those fireworks going off last night did you hear them?
I thought it was someone like a gunshot though
weren't too worried about it though just thought you heard a gunshot
that was in though weren't it?
did you see about that erm car bomb next to Costa's Coffee?
that awful and then they were sort of were getting to a lorry
look how windy it is out there though?
I don't know like how much you're supposed to fill these glasses
I couldn't believe how wet the roads were
it rained a lot this morning
mind you oh it rained all night
I don't know I don't know how you hear the rain at night how do you know it rained all night?
you would if you were in our bedrooms
well well I have the window open
exactly when you're asleep you're not awake so how do you know?
it batters the it batters the bathroom always on the back
sometimes it wakes you up and it goes cos it you can hear it go shh it's quite soothing weirdly
how are your carrots and swede dad? did you get through them?
I made it a priority to deal with them
imagine if you just sat here and like had a Christmas song out and you listened to your Christmas song how weird would that be?
what it was your own Christmas song?
yeah but you could say that about anything like any song why just a Christmas one?
don't know cos it'd be on every year wouldn't it?
cos it happens to be Christmas
I forgot my Downton Abbey hat
it's alright we won't watch it
oh I thought you meant you had a hat for when you watched Downton Abbey
no she hasn't got a hat that she just wears when Downton Abbey's on
did you find the wish bone?
mm probably still in the turkey
I'm sure I saw it before I put it in what's it even for?
it's the middle of the breastbone isn't it?
why do we never do it?
you're meant to put your little finger round it and pull it and you make a wish
and it's like the cracker the one that gets the
what are turkeys like not at Christmas time?
no but I mean like compared to chickens like why do we have chicken and not turkey?
they are s more expensive than chicken
well it was strutting round not long ago
hard to forget that things to do in
aye I suppose it is what was the dance move called that your dad was doing?
I don't know mum I really don't know
was it last night or this morning?
twisting it's not called anything just twist
was it worth getting up for mum?
you're up anyway though so it don't really make a difference to you
well I got up to go to the loo
so I then came down to put the turkey in then your dad goes what are you doing? going out for a walk
what temperature did you put it on?
how long did you put it a hundred and fifty for?
only whacked it up for the last fifteen twenty minutes
just to make sure it wasn't alive
yeah just left it in at a hundred and fifty
so how long was it in for? what time did it come out? twelve?
no it came without came out just after twelve didn't it? about twenty past half past twelve
so it was about five hours?
why do you care? the only thing you've ever cooked me is a
had fucking raw onion in it
cos anyway it'd make the same difference
and do your turkey curry tonight
all kinds of exciting things in it is that the one I put ginger in?
so what else did you find out about last night?
came in at one o'clock very very drunk and and were still up
apparently she came in said she came in bladdered so I was like I was really drunk I was like oh dear
apparently she came in said she came in and said to her mum and dad she went mum make me a pizza at one in the morning on Christmas Eve
I can't remember what they said what did they say? did they say she did it?
yeah yeah she she cooked her a pizza
she made her some kinda food
I wouldn't've made you a pizza
I'd've made you something and I'd've made you eat you know
I wouldn't've made I wouldn't've made you anything cos I'd only be
I'd've been in bed then anyway so I wouldn't've made you anything
well she said she was really shocked said she didn't know why you were up one in the morning
why were they up at one in the morning?
could've been watching a film has been to midnight mass?
no they've been to church this morning
's the one that was saying saying goes ten o'clock I'm tired I'm going to bed they don't stay up late
yeah she's decided on New Year's Eve she's not staying up she's going to bed
they stay up till one o'clock on Christmas Eve though
why not if you've got lots to do
why? what's she got to do?
I meant like says that he watched
Not Going Out and then went to bed
he was too excited weren't he?
what time was that? about eleven?
well he might have they could have seven sprouts couldn't they?
that's not making it any better
they're at home that's where they're going going to and 's
I thought they were going to the s
no they go there in the morning
they want to do the family round they said and then they erm going to and 's for dinner
all along alright you can have it tomorrow
mm carrot crush was very nice
I'm not worried I don't want it but me mother might
do they sing this in Shrek?
do they sing this in Shrek?
not that I'm aware of they sing then I saw her face doo doo doo doo
now I'm a believer doo doo doo doo
not a trace doo doo doo doo
I'm a believer I couldn't leave her if I tried
no I played that song on the clarinet in year four
clari you you've never played the bloody clarinet
and you didn't play that bloody song
not I've had a go and played hot cross buns
one a penny two a penny hot cross buns?
was no one there in the year assembly?
yeah they did they had the clarinet lessons didn't they for a bit?
you know the weird music teacher with the glasses? big glasses?
yeah he came in and everyone was given a caclarinet
my year did in year four
yes I was I was fluent in it
I could play then I saw her face
doo doo doo doo well it's practically the same as a flute but downwards or a recorder
no it's not it's really not
it's not the same as a flute in any way
yeah the whole mouthpiece is different but if I said put your fingers on the keys to which they correspond they would the same
yeah but you wouldn't know if it was right or wrong anyway
I want to take my underpants home with me
oh heck turn it up a bit only a bit Mutt and Jeff
is she on bBC one or something?
I don't know this is what they'll be doing now will they?
don't they do it half an hour before?
can you move out the way so we can see?
no it's filmed about four weeks ago
I like the queen I really do
I like the queen I do
I like the whole rroyal family and I don't get people like that don't like them
but actually actively doesn't like em
I think they've got a massive to play in our society in our country
she always looks nnice doesn't she?
she does she always looks lovely

this slippery turkey is so nice
let's get to the main bit
ah I think so much has happened this year I think in the world that twenty fifteen has been a very big year
